attributes.action:
Give us the Brexit we voted for.

We want Control
attributes.additional_details: Despite the patronising attitude of our politicians who seem to think the British Public are uninformed and/or stupid, when we voted to leave the EU on 23 June 2016, we absolutely WERE aware of what we were voting for and Theresa May was exactly right in her Lancaster House Speech and her Article 50 letter. We were voting for total control. A fudge which would put us in a worse position (such as the Norway option). The unelected Lords disrupt legislation from the elected House.
attributes.background: Of Our borders agriculture fisheries – leave the Internal Market, Trade – leave the Customs Union. Laws – UK Supreme Court be supreme. We knew £350m did not include UK rebate & not ALL go to the NHS. Be out 30.3.19. No 2nd referendum,no transitionunder 12 months.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/201145

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
